project.description: This job does a cleanup of workspace of all jobs

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
REM This deletes the workspace of all the jobs on this machine
rmdir /q /s v:\slavejenkins\workspace\Windows32_msvc10 rmdir /q /s v:\slavejenkins\workspace\Windows32_msvc9 rmdir /q /s v:\slavejenkins\workspace\Windows64_msvc9
